= `tagToIfVar` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [ifSyntax if] > [tagToIfVarMethod tagToIfVar]
=== Parameters ===
 * *$var* _string_
  Dot-separated object path, eg Object.property.inneProperty


Replaces selected tag with PHP "if" statement checking if $var evaluates  to true. $var must be an object available inside template's scope.


$var is passed in JS object convention (dot separated).


Method doesn't change selected elements stack. Returned is source element,  detached from it's parent.


Notice-safe.


Example
{{{
 $template['.if-var']->tagToIfVar('foo.bar');

}}}
Source
{{{
 <div class='if-var'><node1/></div>

}}}
Result
{{{
 <?php
 if ($foo->bar) {
 ?><node1/><?php
 }
 ?>

}}}
----
